alert.note: Alert for Cobb (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 04 at 8:53AM EST until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Sope Creek near Marietta affecting Cobb County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Sope Creek near Marietta. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Flood Stage is reached. Minor flooding of residential yards occurs upstream and downstream from the gage on Lower Roswell Road. This includes homes on the lower portions of Cherokee Place...Pheasant Drive and Pheasant Circle. Portions of the Indian Hills Golf Course near the creek will be flooded with 1 to 2 feet of water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 12.6 feet and rising. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 12 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
